testcase.name: Verify login functionality 3

testcase.name: Verify scroll
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the url.............................................passed And user is on Infinite Scroll page.........................................passed When user scrolls to bottom of page twice...................................passed And user scrolls back to top of the page....................................passed Then user should see the text Infinite Scroll...............................passed

testcase.name: Navigate to key presses page
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to home page...............................................passed When I click on Key Presses link............................................passed Then I should navigate to Key Presses page..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify different key presses
testcase.system-out: Given a web browser is at Key Presses page..................................passed When I press Ctrl key.......................................................passed Then a Ctrl key confirmation message is displayed...........................passed When I press Alt key........................................................passed Then a Alt key confirmation message is displayed............................passed When I press R key..........................................................passed Then a R key confirmation message is displayed..............................passed When I press S key..........................................................passed Then a S key confirmation message is displayed..............................passed
